snippet: Republican and Democratic negotiators closed in on a package of tax cuts for businesses and individuals that could exceed $700 billion in forgone revenues over a decade.
abstract: Congressional negotiators have almost come up with major tax cut package for businesses and individuals that would extend or make permanent about 50 temporary tax breaks due to expire or lapse; Republican and Democratic negotiators say they are intent on getting Congressional approval before end of year.
lead_paragraph: Republican and Democratic negotiators closed in on a package of tax cuts for businesses and individuals that could exceed $700 billion in forgone revenues over a decade.

headline.main: Lawmakers Near Deal on Billions in Tax Cuts
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Near Deal on Billions in Tax Cuts

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget
